## Overview

TriNetX is a global health research network that provides access to de-identified electronic health records from healthcare organizations worldwide. The platform enables real-world evidence research and supports clinical trial design, feasibility, and recruitment.

## Key Features

- **Global Network**: Data from millions of patients across healthcare organizations worldwide
- **Real-Time Analytics**: Interactive platform for querying and analyzing clinical data
- **Cohort Building**: Advanced tools for identifying and characterizing patient populations
- **Comparative Analysis**: Built-in statistical tools for propensity score matching and outcomes analysis
- **Clinical Trial Support**: Feasibility assessment and patient recruitment capabilities
- **Standardized Data**: Harmonized data using common terminologies (ICD, CPT, LOINC, RxNorm)

## Use Cases in Research

- Real-world evidence studies on treatment effectiveness and safety
- Clinical trial feasibility and site selection
- Comparative effectiveness research
- Drug safety and pharmacovigilance
- Disease natural history studies
- Healthcare utilization and outcomes research
